body.p:
Pittsburgh, Pa. Nov. 2d 1863
Secy of State, Ky
Frankfort.

Sir I held the commission of Commissioner for the State of Kentucky for some years having been appointed by Gov. Moorhead. It has now Expired__ it Expired whilst I was absent in the arny, where I have been for most of the time since the war broke out. Having been taken prisoner, I contracted a disease in Sibly Prison at Richmond, which compelled me to resign, and I am now engaged in the practice of the law.
I address you for the purpose of having my commission renewed.

Very Resptfly
Yr Obt servt,
Benj. F. Blood

Pennsylvania
Comr Deeds
B. F. Blood
